recipes.title: ________[Lade Recipes/Items]________
recipes.duplicate: Ingnoriere doppeltes Rezept %namespace%:%key% mit der Configdatei %key%.%file_type%!

outdated.msg: &cDeine Version ist veraltet! Eine neue Version ist verfügbar!

loading.msg: &cPlugin Deaktiviert! Beim laden ist ein Fehler aufgetreten!
loading.msg1: Stell sicher, dass du die neuste Spigot oder Paper Version hast!
loading.msg2: &7Bei Nutzung von 1.13.x stell sicher, dass es die neuste Version ist!
loading.msg3: &7Wie man die neuste Version bekommt, findet ihr hier:
loading.msg6: &cWenn dies nicht funktioniert und es ein Error Nachricht in der Konsole gibt dann Kontaktiere mich auf Discord oder SpigotMC!

patreon.name: &6&lPatreon
lore: &eSpende ein kleines bisschen um die Entwicklung meiner Plugins zu unterstützen!
&eAls Patron wirst du in die Credits geschrieben und du kannst
&eUpdates früher bekommen und Zugang zu indev-builds und mehr bekommen.

discord.name: &9&lDiscord
lore: &eBrauchst du Support? Bug gefunden? Hast Verbesserungsvorschläge oder Ideen?
&eTrete dem Discord bei und trete der community bei!

gui_help: &7- Klick auf die Art von Rezept zum erstellen!
&7- ItemCreator unten links oder RecipeList unten rechts.

item_editor.name: &6Item Ersteller
help: &emit speziellen Funktionen z.B. eigene Haltbarkeit, Ofen Brennstoff

messages.input: &eGebe den ordner und namen des Items ein! z.B. &6waffen diamant_messer
messages.error: &cDieses Item existiert nicht oder ist nicht geladen!

messages.input: &eGebe den ordner und namen des Rezeptes ein! &6waffen diamant_messer

gui_help: &7Wenn ein Rezept aus ist, dann kann es nicht mehr genutzt werden!

enabled.name: &6Schöne Config
lore: &7Json configs werden in richtiger Formatierung gespeichert!

disabled.name: &6Kompakte Config
lore: &7Json configs werden in einer Zeile gespeichert!

gui_help: &7Plaziere ein Item welches du editieren möchtest oben in die Mitte!
&eEinige Funktionen sind nur verfügbar, wenn man das Item speichert!

input.line1: &eGebe den Ordner und Item Namen ein

amount.error: &cError parsing number! Is it a number? It should be!

invalid_version.name: &cUngültige Minecraft Version
lore: &7Du brauchst mindestens 1.14 um es zu nutzen!

meta_ignore.name: &7Mode: &3%VAR%
lore: &eChange the way this meta is checked!
&7Numeric meta can also be configured to
&7only allow for Higher or Lower values!
help: &3EXACT &7- Meta must be exactly the same!
&3IGNORE &7- Meta is ignored and not needed!
&3HIGHER &7- The value can be higher than the set value!
&3LOWER &7- The value can be lower than the set value!

set.name: &6Set Display Name
set.message: &eType in the name! Use &6&& &efor formatting codes!

add.name: &6Add Lore
add.message: &eType in the lore! Use &6& &efor formatting codes!

remove.name: &4Remove Lore
remove.message: &eType in the line of the lore you want to remove!

apply.name: &6Apply Texture
lore: &eApplies the texture of the Player Head
&7«« &ePut the player head with the texture in the empty slot!

remove.name: &4Remove Potion Effect
lore: &eRemove a Potion Effect of the specific type
remove.message: &eType in the Potion name you want to remove!

add_number.name: %C%Add number
lore: §eAdds all of the modifiers' amounts to the current value of the attribute.

add_scalar.name: %C%Multiply number
lore: &eMultiplies the current value of the attribute by (1 + x),
&ewhere x is the sum of the modifiers' amounts

multiply_scalar_1.name: %C%Multiply scalar
lore: &eThe most complex option! Enable help (Top Right) for more info!
&eFor every modifier, multiplies the current value of the attribute by (1 + x),
&ewhere x is the amount of the particular modifier.
help: &eFunctions the same as Operation 1(Multiply) if there is only a single modifier
&eHowever, for multiple modifiers it will multiply the modifiers
&eFor example, modifying an attribute with {Amount:2,Operation:2} and
&e{Amount:4,Operation:2} with a Base of 3 results in 45 (3*(1 + 2)*(1 + 4) = 45)

save.name: &aAdd Attribute
lore: &eApplies an attribute modifier to the item

set_amount.name: &7Amount: &e%NUMBER%
set_amount.message: &eType in the amount you want! For example&6 0.4

set_uuid.name: &7UUID: &e%UUID%
set_uuid.message: &eType in the uuid for the attribute! Must be a valid UUID!

option.name: &6Set Item Damage
lore: &7Set the damage value of the Item

option.name: &6Repair Cost
lore: &7Set the repair cost for this item!

option.name: &6Fuel Settings
lore: &cThe Item must be saved in order to

set.name: &aBurn Time: &7%VAR% ticks
help: &cSet it to 0 will disable this to be
set.message: &eType in the Burn Time in ticks!

reset.name: &cReset Burn Time
lore: &7The item item will not be saved

option.name: &7Durability Cost && Replacement
lore: &cTo use this feature, you need to save the item!
help: &7Set with which item this item gets replaced

enabled.name: &7Durability cost: &3%VAR%
lore: &7 0 = &3removed completely! Use replacement to prevent it!
enabled.message: &eType in the durability cost, which will be subtracted from the item when used in the crafting grid

option.name: &6Custom Durability && Damage &8[&71.14+&8]
lore: &7Set Custom Durability and damage to your item!
&7This will replace the vanilla Durability and Damage!

remove.name: &cRemove
lore: &eRemove the Custom Durability of this item.

set_durability.name: &7Set Durability: &3%VAR%
lore: &eSet a custom durability for this item.

set_damage.name: &7Set Damage: &3%VAR%
set_damage.message: &eType in the custom Damage of the item. &cMax value: 2,147,483,647

set_tag.name: &7Set Tag: &3%VAR%
lore: &eSet the tag which displays the durability and damage
set_tag.message: &eType in the Tag that should appear at the bottom of the lore! %dur%

option.name: &6Permission
lore: &7Set the permission needed to get this item
&7e.g. used it for crafting or anvil recipes results

set.name: &7Set Permssion: &3%VAR%
set.message: &eType in the permission string that players need to get this item

option.name: &6Rarity
lore: &7This value can be used in crafting or anvil results

set.name: &7Set Rarity Percentage: &3%VAR%
lore: &7Type in a value of 1.0 or lower
set.message: &eType in the percentage of how rare this item should be. &cThe number must be smaller than 1.0!

option.name: &6Persistent NBT Data &8[&71.14+&8]
lore: &7Store custom data in NBT, linked to an key.

option.name: &6Elite Workbench &8[&71.14+&8][&7Beta&8]
lore: &7Create and Configure your own unique Workbench

size_3.name: &7Grid size: &73&8x&73
lore: &7Vanilla style crafting in a 3x3 crafting table

size_4.name: &7Grid size: &e4&8x&e4
lore: &eMore space for crafting. Create advanced items

size_5.name: &7Grid size: &65&8x&65
lore: &eEven more slots... to create more complex recipes

size_6.name: &7Grid size: &46&8x&46
lore: &eA very big crafting grid to create very complex recipes.
&cThese recipes need more resources and may result in lag if used too often in a short time!

enabled.name: &aNormal Recipes Allowed
lore: &7Normal Recipes & Elite Recipes can be crafted.
&eCustom Recipes which are not specificly created for the Advanced Workbench

conditions.name: &3Conditions
lore: &eSet conditions to further customize your recipe.

enabled.name: &aExact Meta
lore: &7Items need to be exactly the same!
&7That means if you put in a IronSword with no damage
&7then IronSwords with damage won't be allowed!

disabled.name: &3Ignore Meta
lore: &7Items with Meta still need to be exact!

global_messages.override: &3type the namespace and key from the recipe!

save.input: &3Type in the name of the folder and item! &6folder recipe_name
save.empty: &cCannot save a empty recipe! Check the Result and the Source/ingredients

loading.warning: &cIt is better to restart the Server after you're done, to prevent recipes from not working correctly!

messages.elite_workbench: &eType in the folder and name of the CustomItem! Example: &6workbenches golden_workbench
messages.error: &cThis item does not exist or is not loaded!
messages.no_name: &cYou need to type in the item name!
messages.not_elite_workbench: &cThis item is not an Elite Workbench!

xp.name: &3Experience
xp.message: &3Type in the amount of experience. e.g. 0.5

cooking_time.name: &6Cooking Time
help: &7Set the time how long the item
cooking_time.message: &3Type in the cooking time in ticks. e.g. 20

repair_cost.name: &7Repair Cost:&6 %VAR%
lore: &eMust be greater than 0, else the recipe won't work!
repair_cost.message: &3Type in the amount of repair_cost. &cMust be greater than 0!

durability.name: &7Durability:&6 %VAR%
durability.message: &3Type in the amount of durability. &6>0 increase&7, <0 decrease

repair_mode.name: &7RepairCost mode: &3%VAR%
lore: &eThe mode how the repaircost should be

enabled.name: &6Drop Items
lore: &eItems drop out of the cauldron when done.

disabled.name: &6Keep Items
lore: &eItems stay in the cauldron when recipe is done.
&ePlayer right click replaces the item in their hand.
&e« Set the required item for the player to hold on right click!

enabled.name: &6Fire required
lore: &eFire or lit Campfire is required for this recipe

disabled.name: &6No Fire required
lore: &eThis recipe will only work if no Fire or lit Campfire

disabled.name: &3No Water required!
lore: &eRecipe will only work if cauldron is empty!

enabled.name: &3Water required!
lore: &eRecipe will only work with water in it!

xp.name: &6Experience
lore: &eThe amount xp you get when the recipe is done.
xp.message: &3Type in the amount of experience. e.g. 0.5

cookingTime.name: &6Cooking Time
lore: &eThe time in ticks for the recipe to be done!
cookingTime.message: &3Type in the cooking time in ticks. e.g. 20

waterLevel.name: &3Water Level
lore: &ethis recipe should be able to be made with.
&eThe Water is consumed when the recipe is done!
waterLevel.message: &eType in the amount of water the cauldron needs to have! &cMax: &43

gui_help: &7Setup the variants of the chosen slot.
&7Put in as many Items you want.

enabled.name: &6Fire
lore: &eMake sure that you have a lit
